name: Hold my hand at Twilight
overview: Soramame leaves the countryside for Tokyo in pursuit of a childhood friend and fiancé, but instead he meets a scrappy young musician, Oto. By some odd circumstance, the two end up living under the same roof. Influenced by Oto, Soramame awakens to the world of fashion while Soramame becomes Oto's muse, reviving his forsaken dream of becoming a musician. As they chase their dreams, love is sure to germinate, but it struggles to take off for these two dreamers unwittingly caught in the world's most beautiful love story.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Soramame Asagi, who grew up in rural Kyushu, went to Tokyo in pursuit of her childhood friend and fiancé, where she had a fateful and shocking encounter with a young man named Oto Umino, who aspires to become a musician. The two thought they would never see each other again, but then… [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Soramame and Oto had a fateful and shocking encounter. The two thought they would never see each other again, but through a strange twist of fate, Soramame and Oto ended up living together. And then, unexpectedly, their love begins! [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Soramame encountered a “dream” in Tokyo that made her heart race, and she became interested in fashion. Meanwhile, Oto is finally set to make his major label debut with a song he has newly composed since living with Soramame. Soramame and Oto’s lives are set in motion by a fateful encounter. The distance between the two, whose relationship has been a comforting and calming one, is finally drawing closer?! A secret kiss on the loveliest of days! [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Soramame and Oto live like a family under one roof, unable to express the subtle and complicated feelings they have inside themselves. Soramame and Kyoko Yukihira go to see Toru Kuon, the designer of the fashion brand “Ander Sonia”. Oto also decided to look for a diva to form a unit together with Isobe Maki. Their respective dreams begin, but there are trials ahead! [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: “Will you become unreachable?” As they walk toward each other’s dreams, the distance between Soramame and Oto gradually changes. Soramame spends her days as an apprentice designer, devoting everything to designing under Kuon, while Oto meets a new diva with whom he forms a unit, and their talents begin to shine. Meanwhile, Soramame begins to feel that Oto, who is about to make his debut, is going far away… [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Soramame and Oto met the diva Seira Kanno. Soramame and Oto, who live together under one roof and are pursuing their dreams, have a hard time being honest about their feelings, but suddenly Seira joins their relationship. Soramame sees Oto and Seira together, and while she supports Oto in pursuing his dream, she begins to be confused about her own feelings… [ECOTVSubs]

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Soramame accidentally sees Oto hugging Seira and leaves. Meanwhile, Oto mistakenly believes that Soramame and Hazuki have started dating… Soramame and Oto, who have been in love for a long time but keep passing over, are about to have a real breakup. [ECOTVSubs]
